attributes.action: Scrap 14 day quarantine. The damage has already been done. Save our tourism
attributes.additional_details: Some people have families abroad and work hard in this country pay taxes to save all year to go on a 2 week holiday (which can only be taken at term time when you have children) for this year to be give an extra 14 days fir staying at home even if you are fit and healthy and have just visited family.
attributes.background: There is not much point doing a 14 quarantine during the summer knowing full well most of us have booked holidays and some people dont have family here in tbis country like my family and we look forward to seeing them every year and we work hard for the money we spend, to not even get a refund.
